meanings.definition: A person who is new to a particular activity or community.
meanings.sent1: The online game was full of newbs who were still learning how to play.
meanings.sent2: The newbs in the cooking class were eager to improve their skills.
meanings.sent3: The newbs at the dance party kept stepping on each other's toes.
meanings.sent4: The newbs in the hiking group were like lost puppies, unsure of the trail.
meanings.sent5: The newbs in the book club were like fresh flowers, bringing new perspectives.

meanings.definition: To act like a newb or exhibit behavior typical of a newb.
meanings.sent1: Don't newbs around and ask for help when you need it.
meanings.sent2: She tends to newbs whenever she tries a new sport.
meanings.sent3: He newbs his way through the video game, making rookie mistakes.
meanings.sent4: The comedian newbs his way through the stand-up routine, stumbling over jokes.
meanings.sent5: The actor newbs his lines on stage, forgetting his part in the play.
